Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client

Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client
Package
Description
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client
Asynchronous LDAP client for Gumdrop's non-blocking I/O framework.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client
    Class
    Description
    AddResultHandler
    Handler for add operation results.
    BindResultHandler
    Handler for bind operation results.
    CompareResultHandler
    Handler for compare operation results.
    DeleteResultHandler
    Handler for delete operation results.
    DerefAliases
    LDAP alias dereferencing policy as defined in RFC 4511.
    ExtendedResultHandler
    Handler for extended operation results.
    LDAPClient
    LDAP client implementation that creates and manages LDAP client connections.
    LDAPConnected
    Operations available after LDAP connection is established.
    LDAPConnectionReady
    Handler interface for receiving the initial LDAP connection ready event.
    LDAPPostTLS
    Operations available after STARTTLS upgrade completes.
    LDAPResult
    Represents an LDAP operation result.
    LDAPResultCode
    LDAP result codes as defined in RFC 4511.
    LDAPSession
    Operations available in an authenticated LDAP session.
    Modification
    Represents a modification to an LDAP entry attribute.
    Modification.Operation
    Modification operation types.
    ModifyDNResultHandler
    Handler for modify DN (rename/move) operation results.
    ModifyResultHandler
    Handler for modify operation results.
    SearchRequest
    Represents an LDAP search request.
    SearchResultEntry
    Represents a single entry from an LDAP search result.
    SearchResultHandler
    Handler for search operation results.
    SearchScope
    LDAP search scope as defined in RFC 4511.
    StartTLSResultHandler
    Handler for STARTTLS extended operation results.
